instruction: Provide an example of how the given technology can be used in everyday life.
output: Virtual Reality (VR) can be used in everyday life in a variety of ways. For example, VR can be used to take virtual tours of exotic destinations without leaving the comfort of home. It can be used to experience virtual concerts, sports games, and to play immersive video games. VR can also be used for training purposes, such as simulating emergency situations or to learn complex tasks in a safe and controllable environment.
